explains: int. （表示迟疑或说话中间停顿）嗯，呃

sentences.en: Um, I'm not sure how to ask you this...
sentences.cn: 嗯，我不知该怎么问你这个…

sentences.en: She felt her face going red. "I'm sorry Rob, it's just that I'm, um, overwhelmed."
sentences.cn: 她感到她的脸变红了。“对不起，罗伯，只是我，嗯，有些不知所措。”

sentences.en: Um, I just go home and watch TV.
sentences.cn: 嗯，我仅仅是回家、看电视。
